DOC.brief_summary: Ultrasound ( US ) guide embryo transfer ( ET ) appear improve pregnancy outcomes IVF-ET . Most report do use transabdominal ( TAS ) approach , contrast transvaginal ultrasound ( TVS ) require full bladder . We seek determine either approach well respect clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Embryo Transfer : Abdominal Versus Transvaginal , RCT
DOC.criteria: All patient undergo assisted reproductive cycle include autologous IVF , oocyte donation , frozen embryo transfer ( FET ) cycle Cases severe ovarian hyperstimulation require embryo cryopreservation gestational surrogate cycle
